hero.primaryHeadline: The Digital Marketing Agency that boosts your revenue while you sleep soundly.
hero.secondaryHeadlineEnd: in California, Morocco and soon in Dubai.

hero.trustIndicators: Trusted by over **1,200 clients** and **1,600+ successful projects worldwide**.

system.title: Our System
system.subtitle: We build systems, not campaigns. Here's how we turn your business into a lead generation engine.

step1.title: Content That Builds Authority
step1.description: Performance-driven content that positions you as the expert and attracts your ideal clients.

step2.title: Paid Ads That Drive Targeted Traffic
step2.description: Strategic advertising on Meta, Google, and LinkedIn that brings qualified prospects to your funnel.

step3.title: Funnel That Qualifies Serious Leads
step3.description: Smart qualification systems that filter out tire-kickers and identify ready-to-buy prospects.

step4.title: CRM & Automation That Increases Closing Rate
step4.description: Automated follow-up systems that nurture leads and convert them into customers while you sleep.

results.title: Real Results, Real Revenue
results.subtitle: See how we've helped businesses generate predictable lead flow and revenue growth.

servicesSection.title: Our Digital Marketing Solutions
servicesSection.intro: At 63 Agency, every solution is designed to generate qualified leads, reduce your cost per acquisition, and turn traffic into measurable revenue.
servicesSection.solution1Subtitle: We implement complete systems to generate qualified prospects predictably.
servicesSection.solution1Goal: Goal: feed your sales pipeline every month.
servicesSection.solution2Subtitle: We launch and optimize ROI-driven advertising campaigns.
servicesSection.solution2Tagline: We're not after clicks. We're after results.
servicesSection.solution3Subtitle: We design strategic websites built to convert.
servicesSection.solution3Bullet5: CRM & tracking integration (Meta Pixel, GA, GTM)
servicesSection.solution3Tagline: A website isn't a business card. It's a revenue generation tool.
servicesSection.solution4Tagline: Every piece of content serves one clear goal: generating a lead.
servicesSection.solution5Result: Result: only qualified prospects for your team.
servicesSection.solution6Subtitle: Strategic design at the service of performance.
servicesSection.solution6Tagline: Design that builds trust and increases conversion rate.
servicesSection.ctaTitle: Ready to turn your marketing into predictable revenue?

founder.title: With our expertise: turn your vision into tangible reality!
founder.name: Saad Chahoubi
founder.description: Our ambition is to harmonize the art of marketing with the science of finance, creating a solid foundation for campaigns that not only capture attention but also convert and retain. We build lasting relationships with our clients, offering them transparency, accountability, and measurable return on investment.
founder.extendedDescription: At 63 Agency, we believe that performance marketing rests on data and a clear strategy. Every campaign is designed to deliver measurable results and predictable ROI, while building trust with our partners.
